contentTypes.name: Block - Copy
contentTypes.description: Simply renders a block of text.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, and underline marks are allowed
Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, table, link to Url, asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Block - Spacer
contentTypes.description: Adds vertical space between other blocks.

contentTypes.name: Block - Wrapper
contentTypes.description: Supports wrapping child blocks with a different background color.

contentTypes.name: Responsive Asset
contentTypes.description: Switches between different assets depending on a landscape or portrait aspect ratio.

settings.helpText: If empty, the Entry Title will be used.
Try to keep below 160 characters.
Recommended 1200 x 627.
Only displayed in the Admin.
A path with a leading slash.
A path with a leading slash or an external URL.
Only displayed in Admin.

Attempt to make each line of text the same width. Note, this requires javascript measuring the dimensions of elements on the page and so has a performance impact, so it's recommended to use this feature sparingly.
Prevent the last word of text from being on it's own line.
Only displayed in Admin.
Medium is good for an indented effect, Small is good for Copy
Only displayed in the Admin.
Try to keep below 160 characters.
Recommended 1200 x 627.
Only displayed in admin.
The text within the button.
Use an absolute path (ex: "/contact") for internal links.
Only displayed in Admin.
Typically used for a desktop variant of an image.
Typically used for a mobile variant of an image.  Leave empty to use the Landscape image for all device aspect ratios.
Typically used for a desktop variant of a video.
Typically used for a mobile variant of a video.  Leave empty to use the Landscape video for all device aspect ratios.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content
